short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover if a website is Shopify Or Not? A free browser extension that helps you to identify if its a shopify store or not.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover if a store is built using Shopify Or Not? A extension that helps you to identify if its a shopify store or not as well as other tools and Shopify Apps used by the store.
